PHRASE.LANG: With the Wacky Walk - Hands, no more walking a mile in other people's shoes, now just tell them to walk a mile with their hands. [#Legal]
Avec la Marche Wacky - Mains, pas plus marcher un mile dans les souliers des autres, maintenant juste leur dire de marcher un mile avec leurs mains. [#Legal]
With the Wacky Walk - Hands, no more walking a mile in other people's shoes, now just tell them to walk a mile with their hands. [#Legal]
